detaileddescription.para: Represents whether a CentipedeSegment is a head.
Represents whether a CentipedeSegment is a body.

briefdescription.para: A strongly typed enum class representing the BodyType of the centipede.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Grid &grid, BodyType bodytype, Position position, Direction cur_Direction)
memberdef.name: CentipedeSegment

briefdescription.para: Parameterized Constructor. Creates a centipede segment object.

parameterdescription.para: is of type BodyType enum class.
is of type Direction enum class.

briefdescription.para: Virtual Destructor. Destroys a CentipedeSegment object.
Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that moves a CentipedeSegment object.
Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that returns the current direction of a CentipedeSegment object.

simplesect.para: Direction an enum of the enum class Direction.

briefdescription.para: Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that sets the direction of a CentipedeSegment object.

parameterdescription.para: an enum of enum class Direction.

briefdescription.para: Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that returns a enum of ObjectType of a CentipedeSegment object.

simplesect.para: An enum of the strongly typed enum class ObjectType.

briefdescription.para: Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that returns a centre position of the CentipedeSegment object.

simplesect.para: Position of the CentipedeSegment object containing its current position.

briefdescription.para: Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that returns a BoundaryBox indicating the rectangular area covered by a CentipedeSegment object.

simplesect.para: BoundaryBox object of the type BoundaryBox.

briefdescription.para: Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that queries if a CentipedeSegment object is still alive or not.
Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that sets the CentipedeSegment object as not alive when killed.
Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that gets a constant copy of the CentipedeSegment object's number of lives left.

simplesect.para: int containing the number of lives.

briefdescription.para: Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that will not be implemented because CentipedeSegment objects have one life only.
Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that will be used to return the poisoned status of the CentipedeSegment objects.

simplesect.para: bool stating whether the CentipedeSegment object is poisoned or not.

briefdescription.para: Inherited from IMovingEntity. A virtual function that will be used to poison a CentipedeSegment object by changing the poisoned status to true.
A function that returns the previous direction of an object.

simplesect.para: The direction of the object of type Direction of the enum class.

briefdescription.para: A function that changes the direction of the object to Down, this is called when a collision is detected in front of an object.
A function that returns the body type of the centipede segment.

simplesect.para: The body type of the object of type BodyType of the enum class.

briefdescription.para: A function that sets the body type of the centipede segment.

parameterdescription.para: is of type BodyType of the enum class.

briefdescription.para: A function that returns the rotation angle of the centipede segment.

simplesect.para: The rotation angle of type float.

briefdescription.para: A function that saves positions where the head of centipede train had a collision.
A function that clears the vector of positions where the head of centipede train had a collision.
Controls the movements of the centipede segment upon entry.
A function that decrements y axis of the object's position.
A function that increments y axis of the object's position.
A function that decrements x axis of the object's position.
A function that increments x axis of the object's position.
Determines whether the CentipedeSegment has reached a position where the head collided. If it has the changeDirection() function is called.
Moves the centipede segment accordingly when it is poisoned.
This is a class that inherits from the IMovingEntity class. It contains virtual functions that will be overridden by CentipedeSegment class.
